mixed-citation.article-title: Review of the braconid parasitoid subfamily Doryctinae (Hymenoptera, Braconidae) from the United Arab Emirates and Yemen

tp:treatment-sec.p: Mimodoryctes proprius – Yu et al. 2016 . — Edmardash et al. 2020: 66 .

tp:taxon-treatment.p: Fig. 11. Mimodoryctes arabicus Edmardash, Gadallah & Soliman, 2020 , ♀ (RMNH). A . Habitus, lateral view. B . Basal segments of antenna. C . Apical segments of antenna. D . Head, front view. E . Head, dorsal view. F . Wings. G . Metasoma, dorsal view.

Fig. 12. Mimodoryctes proprius Belokobylskij, 2001 , holotype, ♀ (MNBG). A . Habitus, lateral view. B . Head, front view. C . Head, dorsal view. D . Head, lateral view. E . Fore tibia. F . Apical segments of antenna. G . Basal segments of antenna. H . Head, latero-posterior view. I . Mesosoma, dorsal view. J . Mesosoma, lateral view. K . Propodeum and first tergite of metasoma, dorsal view. L . Ovipositor.

Fig. 13. Mimodoryctes proprius Belokobylskij, 2001 . A , C–D . Holotype, ♀ (MNBG). B . Arabian specimen (RMNH). A . Fore wing. B . Fore and hind wings. C . Metasoma, dorsal view. D . Metasoma, lateral view.

tp:treatment-sec.p: YEMEN • 1 ♀ ; “Yemen (6141), Al Kowd, 16–20.viii.2001 , light trap , A.v. Harten & S. Al Haruri. RMNH’02”; RMNH .
